title: Mt. Gox rumors panic Bitcoin Twitter as BTC price returns below $20K
description: Claims that 137,000 BTC are about to be offloaded on the open market are met with intense suspicion as BTC price volatility returns.
author: Cointelegraph By  William Suberg

title: Bitcoin price briefly falls below $20K on ‘bunch of nothing’ Powell speech
description: Bitcoin could well sink below the $20,000 mark again, traders warn, with price targets now as low as $16,000.
author: Cointelegraph By  William Suberg

title: US stocks lose $1.25T in a day — more than entire crypto market cap
description: Risk assets take a major blow as Fed Chair Jerome Powell stays firmly hawkish on inflation and monetary policy.
author: Cointelegraph By  William Suberg

title: Hetzner anti-crypto policies: A wake-up call for Ethereum’s future
description: The terms of services, laid down by Ethereum’s second-biggest host Hetzner, prohibits customers from running nodes, mining and farming, plotting, storage of blockchain data and trading.
author: Cointelegraph By  Arijit Sarkar

title: Bitcoin risks worst August since 2015 as hodlers brace for ‘Septembear’
description: Serious cold feet over the outlook for monthly timeframes with September historically a “red” month.
author: Cointelegraph By  William Suberg

title: Binance froze $1M corporate account due to law enforcement request
description: The crypto exchange accused a Tezos tool contributor of "mislead[ing] the community" by claiming it was unaware of the reason Binance blocked access to its corporate account.
author: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright

title: Price analysis 8/26: BTC, ETH, BNB, XRP, ADA, SOL, DOGE, DOT, SHIB, MATIC
description: Bitcoin and altcoins followed stocks lower after hawkish statements from the Federal Reserve confirmed that the central bank remains serious about reducing inflation.
author: Cointelegraph By Rakesh Upadhyay

title: Rocky road lies ahead, but here are 5 altcoins that still look bullish
description: Bitcoin price looks set for more downside, but this could present trade opportunities in MATIC, ATOM, XMR and CHZ.
author: Cointelegraph By Rakesh Upadhyay

title: Top 10 most Googled questions about cryptocurrency and its implication
description: The top 10 Google searches related to cryptocurrencies uncover an increase in curiosity among general investors — represented by two “Whys,” three “Whats” and five “Hows.”
author: Cointelegraph By  Arijit Sarkar

title: Crypto will become an inflation hedge — just not yet
description: Crypto can act as protection against inflation, but not until it establishes its fundamentals and achieves mass adoption.
author: Cointelegraph By Jarek Hirniak

title: Bitcoin threatens 20-month low monthly close with BTC price under $20K
description: Traders are increasingly betting on a deeper dive to June’s lows or even beyond, with $20,000 struggling to hold.
author: Cointelegraph By  William Suberg

title: Coinbase says it will ‘evaluate any potential forks’ following the Merge
description: “Should an ETH PoW fork arise following The Merge, this asset will be reviewed with the same rigor as any other asset that is listed on our exchange,” said Coinbase.
author: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright

title: Pro-blockchain narratives hinder Bitcoin adoption, says StackinSat founder
description: Josselin Tonnellier, the founder of crypto investment banking firm StackinSat, said that while organizing an event during the bear market was difficult, seeing attendees from abroad was very rewarding.
author: Cointelegraph By  Ezra Reguerra

title: Bitcoin mining difficulty set for 8-month record gains despite BTC price dip
description: Bitcoin network fundamentals seem not to care about spot price weakness, with both difficulty and hash rate making an impressive recovery.
author: Cointelegraph By  William Suberg

title: Bear market uncertainty is the perfect time to build and learn, says Sato exec
description: Fanny Philip, COO of Sato Technology, doubled down on believing that bear markets should be considered a builder’s market for mining companies.
author: Cointelegraph By  Savannah Fortis

title: MakerDAO co-founder recommends DAI-USD depegging to limit attack surface
description: While revealing the protocol’s inability to comply with regulators, Christensen suggested that “we must choose the path of decentralization.”
author: Cointelegraph By  Arijit Sarkar

title: Hacker tries to exploit bridge protocol, fails miserably: Finance Redefined
description: Majority of the DeFi tokens in the top-100 had a mixed week as several tokens traded in red while a few others managed to make double-digit gains.
author: Cointelegraph By  Prashant Jha

title: Crypto Biz: Step aside, Warren Buffett; stablecoin issuers hold more US debt than Berkshire Hathaway
description: Stablecoin issuers Tether, Circle and others hold more short-term U.S. Treasury Bills than Berkshire Hathaway.
author: Cointelegraph By Sam Bourgi

title: Low cap crypto is like penny stocks, says Wolf of Wall Street
description: “I don’t think there’s any amount of research that you can do to protect yourself from these ultra low cap [assets], except getting in really, really early,” said Jordan Belfort.
author: Cointelegraph By Brian Quarmby

title: Blockchain audits: The steps to ensure a network is secure
description: In order for blockchain firms to truly validate their internal security protocols, they need to be audited thoroughly. Here’s a brief rundown of how the process goes.
author: Cointelegraph By Shiraz Jagati
